resources.string: It's like, already the arvo?
<no>Didn't time just fly by today.
Have a good arvo, mate.
Oh, like, good afternoon, <PlayerName>.
<wave>Catch you on the flip side!
<yes>It will, like, be dark soon.
Use that daylight up, <PlayerName>!
Hi, <PlayerName>.
I'm kinda, like, busy with the <bugComp> right now...
I'm going to flog everyone at this <bugComp>.
Oh, wackadoo!
What a nice <birthday> gift!
Thank you, <PlayerName>.
<pumped>Bonza!
<glee>I, like, knew I could count on you.
Now, I have something for, <PlayerName>!
<glee>I hope you like it!
<no>There’s no WAY I could work the hours <NPCName> works...
<thinking>He told me he’s doing it for his brother...
But wouldn’t his brother want him to be happy?
<NPCName>’s scarecrows are like, so rude.
<no>They keep the birds away, but when I wave they never wave back.
Maybe I look too much like a bird?
<yes><NPCName> is adorable!
<haha>Teeterin’ and totterin’ and grumblin’ around everywhere.
<glee>I just wanna like, give him a hug!
<yes><NPCName> told me where I could find my lucky watering can..
<shy>But like, I haven’t lost it...
<thinking>...yet?
<NPCName> looks like, stunning for her age...
<thinking>Although I guess that depends on how old she is?
I really like <NPCName>, but his animals better stay away from my crops!
<thinking>Those little critters are adorable though!
Well… I guess they can have like, a little nibble?
<NPCName> asked me for some of my plants to put in his museum...
<no>Can you believe that?
<worried>My poor babies all like, cooped up behind glass?
<yes>Sometimes I think <NPCName> likes money more than he likes people.
He must be so lonely, don’t you think?
It’s like, good to see you, <PlayerName>.
What's up?
<wave>Catch ya!
Hi <PlayerName>!
How goes it?
Bye!
It’s <PlayerName>!
Right on!
<wave>Later!
Oh, G’day <PlayerName>!
Don’t be a stranger, okay?
Hey, it’s <PlayerName>!
What’s up?
Catch you later!
Looks like my day just got a little better.
<glee>Nice to see you <PlayerName>!
<wave>See you around!
Oh, hi there, I’m <myName>.
I’m a <Nomad> that’s, like, looking to sell seeds. I’ve got farming equipment too if you’re interested.
<shy>Although I can only sell them to people who have a <FarmingLicence>.
<IslandName> is beautiful, don’t you think?
<glee>I’ve been to a lot of places in my time and like, it’s really nice here.
Hey <PlayerName>.
I hope you didn’t, like, miss out on a <Snag>?
Mine was absolutely bonza!
Oh, and apparently <NPCName> has some kind of surprise for us tonight?
Happy <IslandDay>, <PlayerName>!
It’s a day to like, celebrate <IslandName>.
<glee>I’m like, so happy to be a part of it!
Wow!
<glee>I’ve, like, never seen the sky look so happy before.
<haha>And I’ve spend a lot of time with my head in those clouds!
I reckon some of my family would love to see something like this…
Oh, <PlayerName>!
Just in time for some, like, really bonza <Snags>!
<NPCName> has cooked everyone their own personal flavour!
What’s new, <PlayerName>?
See you around
Like, what do you need?
Seeya!
How goes it?
<wave>Hooroo
What's up, <PlayerName>?
Okay!
Oh! It’s like, <PlayerName>!
Right on.
Oh, hi there, <PlayerName>.
Do you, like, need anything?
<wave>Bye!
<yes>It’s so early, but like, I’ve already got a good feeling about today!
<wave>Catch you later, <PlayerName>!
Love that morning feeling.
You know what I mean?
Enjoy your morning!
Hey, <PlayerName>.
What can I, like, do for you this morning?
<sigh>Oh, like, okay…
<scared>Pretty spooky out tonight, huh?
Stay safe, <PlayerName>.
<scared>Whoa. I just got chills.
<shy>It’s probably nothing…
Stay safe, <PlayerName>.
<no>I, like, don’t reall love the dark.
Anyway, what’s up, <PlayerName>?
<scared>Leaving already?
Oh, <PlayerName>.
What brings you to see little ol’ me?
<wave>Hooroo!
I’m getting peckish.
<wave>Later, <PlayerName>.
Bonza.
I’m, like, already having a lovely day and who do I see but <PlayerName>?
See you around, <PlayerName>!
Welcome to the Greenhouse!
<glee>How can I help?
I want to chat.
Nevermind.
Later!
<glee><IslandName> is so... Bonza. There are, like, trees and flowers everywhere.
<haha>It’s kind of overwhelming!
<yes>Anyplace you can think of going, there’s a plant that got there first. Trust me.
<proud>I’ve been, like, all over the place.
<shy>I, like, have a confession to make… I didn’t have a <FarmingLicence> until recently…
I like, didn’t even know it was a thing I needed?
<shy>I was growing plants, like, illegally I guess!
<yes>I like to think of my plants as children.
<glee>I have, like, a huge family!
<haha>It’s growing all the time!
I grew up travelling with my family.
<shy>We were lucky enough to have an <AirShip>.
<shy>I, like, guess you could say the sky's my home and stuff.
<thinking>Do you ever wonder what the clouds are made of?.
<no>They look like they are soft and fluffy, but like, when you are up there they are, like, not...
<yes>Even though I, like, spent most of my life in the sky, I feel like I’ve got this special connection to the earth somehow?
Do you know what I mean?
Out of all vegies, I think I like <favouriteFood> the best.
<glee>I could, like, eat them all day.
<thinking>If I’m quiet enough, sometimes it feels like I hear the trees whispering. It’s, like, hard to describe the sound...
<thinking>It kind of sounds like a gust of air, blowing through the leaves...
<yes>If you treat your crops with care, feed them and love them, then they will love you back.
<glee>You’ll get back more than you sow!
<no>A lot of people from <SouthCity> don’t know how to act around <Nomads> like me.
<haha>They get worried if you don’t know how to, like, fill out their paperwork.
<proud>Let alone if you start talking about the big wide world outside of <SouthCity>!
<yes>My family and I have been basically everywhere.
<thinking>I guess being a <Nomads> I, like, take it for granted…
But not everyone gets to be as lucky as I have been.
<shy> I’ve seen so much!
<sigh>I just wish I got to hang around a bit longer whenever we landed.
<yes>Trees can be, like, such crazy characters.
<no>They’re always throwing shade and I just can’t help but love them for it.
<glee>I guess it’s okay when it’s from your friends, right <PlayerName>?
<thinking>When I was younger, I used to, like, experiment with all kinds of crazy plants.
<yes>Sometimes you have to know what you don’t like before you find out what you do.
<haha>I found out I like everything just the same!
I’ve only been to <SouthCity> a few times before.
<no>It’s like, gross and cold and stuff.
<no>I didn’t see a single plant growing anywhere.
<sigh>Totally not bonza.
What exactly are <PermitPoints> anyway?
I didn’t grow up in <SouthCity>, so I’m not quite sure what they, like, do?
In fact I don’t really get the whole <Licence> thing.
Why can’t everyone just, like, do what they want and stuff?
I see you carrying around that <Journal> around a fair bit.
<thinking>You’re always opening it and stuff.
What’s it got in there anyway?
<haha>And where can I, like, get one of those?
I found a bunch of, like, shiny trash in the ground when I was planting the other day.
<no>It was, like, so cold and lifeless.
Who would even waste time making junk like that?
<proud>I think my plants can be a little like me sometimes.
<glee>But they just love the sun and are always reaching for the sky!
<no>Even after all these years, I still can’t get my head around how much can grow from so little.
Just one little seed can grow, like, massive?
<yes>I think it’s really bonza all the things you do around here, <PlayerName>.
<shy>You kinda, like, inspire me to do more things and stuff.
<yes>Tilling and planting can be a lot of hard work, but like, it's worth it.
You feel like, YOU did that, yeah?
<glee>YOU made that happen.
<pumped>Bonza.
<thinking>The rain saves me so much time watering plants sometimes.
<no>It's still a bummer though.
<haha>Like, good job, but go away already, right?
It can be hard to lose some of your crops.
<no>I don’t like to talk about it, but it like, happened to me once or twice.
<glee>Just look after them like you’ve been looking after me and everything will work out just fine.
When you started out here did you ever expect us to come so far?
<thinking>All this change and growth around <IslandName>.
<glee>It’s like, good job everybody!
You see so much from high up in an <AirShip>, but like, you don’t get to really connect with anything?
<yes>I feel super connected here though.
That’s got a lot to do with you, <PlayerName>, so, thanks!
The soil here is like, amazing for planting.
<thinking>So full of nutrients, like it just wants to help our little fellas grow.
It must be all the love and care we put into them, you think?
Definitely!
It’s just soil
<glee>Well, lets like, keep it up!
<haha>I guess it’s just me helping out, then!
I always kinda knew I was special?
Like, meant for something?
I sure hope it’s plant related…
<haha> \nCos I’m like, all-in on this plant thing!
<no>You can’t do everything alone...
And even if you could, I don’t think you should?
You’re not going anywhere anytime soon, right <PlayerName>?
No way!
Maybe...
<glee> Bonza, cos there’s so much more work to do!
<haha>Well, you better not forget about me!
<thinking>Plants need strong healthy roots to reach their full potential.
<yes>I think people can be like that too, right?
<glee>Even if it takes some time and attention, a good support network is, like, so important to set up.
There’s just something about <IslandName> that makes my heart feel at home.
<thinking>I can’t quite pin it down...
I think maybe I, like, don’t want to?
<yes>When someplace is a good fit, you just know, know what I mean?
<shy>It’s, like, always a pleasure to see you, <PlayerName>.
<glee>The way you run around town helping everyone out, it’s like, totally bonza.
<no>I, like, never thought I would call one place home before.
<shy>Not until now at least!
<no>I guess I’m not a <Nomad> anymore.
I guess I’m, like, a <IslandName> resident!
<shy>You know, <PlayerName>, I consider you, like, one of my closest friends.
<shy>I feel like I should be more upfront with the people I care about.
<haha>So there. Was that like, upfront enough?
<yes>I feel like our friendship has, like, really grown, <PlayerName>.
<haha>And no one even had to water it!
<PlayerName>, you’ve really done a great job getting <IslandName> up and running.
This place is, like, going to be bonza.
Have I mentioned how bonza <IslandName> is looking and stuff.
It’s, like, looking better and better every day.
<glee>And it’s all thanks to you, <PlayerName>.
I love what you’ve been doing around here, <PlayerName>.
<yes>You obviously, like, put a lot of work into the town.
<glee>It’s so bonza having you around <IslandName>
<no> \nI can’t believe this is the same <IslandName> I used to visit in my little tent!
<pumped>This place is, like, amazing and stuff.
<yes>You should be so proud of yourself, <PlayerName>.
<glee>Keep up the bonza work!
<pumped>This is my favourite part of <SkyFest>!
<glee>The part where we all, like, get to fly a <Kite>!
<shy>I used to love doing this with my family.
Chasing the <PaperLanterns> through the sky is the highlight of <SkyFest> for me.
<shy>It, like, reminds me of home!
Hey, <PlayerName>!
<glee>Happy <SkyFest>!
This event is, like, really special to me.
<glee>I’m so excited!
Isn’t that <Aurora> amazing, <PlayerName>?
What a, like, totally bonza <SkyFest> Fletch has thrown for us.
<shy>I thought I was going to have a hard time today.
<no>Like, I really miss my family and stuff.
<glee>But I guess everyone here on <IslandName> is, like, a new family.
I’ve made my <Kite>!
It’s like, totally bonza.
<glee>I can't wait to fly it!
Do you miss your family a lot?
I still keep in touch with my brother.
That’s so sweet.
You haven’t seen your family?
Not for a while… it’s complicated.
I don’t think I really need that?
It’s top of the line, it’ll save you heaps of time!
But like, I don’t really fish?
Well, why not start today?
Are your bananas ethically sourced?
What? I don’t think the trees mind.
Are they like, sustainable trees?
They haven’t fallen over yet!
Do you like, always speak your mind?
Approximately five percent of it, yes.
What’s in the rest?
It is beyond words.
Oh, so like, numbers and stuff?
Do you ever miss South City?
Only the Blobfish.
I heard they were like, completely bland and flavourless.
Precisely. They were not distracting.
I think you’d really enjoy gardening.
Why do you say that?
It can be really, like, chill?
I am quite “chill” enough.
Um… if you say so…
I love your work. It’s a shame about the trees though.
Trees? Nah, I only use logs and planks.
Yeah but, they used to be trees, right?
Well, we all gotta start somewhere.
Where’d you learn to make things?
Here and there.
Oh, you like, taught yourself?
Nah, I reckon the splinters taught me pretty well.
You seem like, really sad sometimes.
Just me face, I reckon.
So really you’re secretly feelin’ bonza?
I get by, yeah.
I’m gonna take that as a yes.
Righto.
I like, love your store.
Thanks, but she’s taken.
No, I mean, I love your fashion!
So does she, y’know?
Where do you come up with your ideas?
You just have to feel them, y’know?
Like, kinda?
So take that “kinda”, and just run with it!
I’m so exhausted from today.
Oh, you should meditate more.
That’s like, doing nothing, right?
Sort of, but better, y’know?
It’s pretty crazy you managed to make this happen.
Nothing crazy about it, just one foot in front of the other.
Still, you like, started it all!
It’s like my Dad used to say. Get it done!
So how old are you? Like, really?
I can’t answer that!
Oh, you poor thing. I guess your memory must be going…
What?! No! I mean, it’s none of your bloody business!
Hey, you’ve got some real pep in your step today!
Thanks dear. I’ve been doing my morning stretches every day this week.
Well, keep at it, because it’s really working for you. You look amazing!
I sure will. So, which licences did you want to talk about?
How did you know I like, wanted something?
You couldn’t be more obvious with a sign around your neck, I tell you what!
I love how much attention you give to your critters.
They sure deserve it. We’re lucky to have them around.
Awwww, that’s so sweet!
Really though, I mean, how lucky are we? Unreal!
Croco’s are like, so scary!
Nah, they’re just misunderstood.
All those teeth, and they’re not afraid to use them!
They just like to keep to themselves, I reckon.
Do the Wary Mus scare you?
Oh, those critters can sure run!
I know, right? It’s like, calm down guys, I was leaving!
Such amazing critters, and the size of those eggs!
Have you ever used a scythe?
Who told you that?!
N-n-nobody, I just, like, wheat is like hair, right?
You’d think so…
Um…
You’d be wrong.
Oh…
So like, how’s the salon thing going?
A little quiet actually, lately. Were you thinking of popping in?
No way! Um, I mean, I was thinking of growing it out a little.
Right, yeah, of course. If you change your mind though, you know where to find me.
Totally. Awesome.
So I heard you used to mine?
Yeah. Back in <SouthCity> for a while.
I bet things can get pretty freaky-deaky when you get super deep down, huh?
Definitely. I think you’d like it though.
What makes you say that?
There’s all sorts of weird and whacky plants down there! One of them even tried to eat me!
Oh wow! Now those? Those I have to see. Like, for reals.
Why do you only get one of each?
One is all you need for the records.
Don’t they like, get lonely?
Oh! Um. I hope not?
I think I’d be lonely in a cage by myself.
They’re not by themselves! They have tons of friends!
Yeah, but they’re all different types…
So are we, and we’re friends, right?
Oh yeah! I guess you’re right.
I’ve been loving your museum lately!
Oh, um, thank you.
It’s like, so nice to appreciate all those creepy-crawlies when they’re not trying to eat my crops.
Why would they be doing that?
I guess I can’t blame them. Everything’s gotta eat something!
Oh. Um. Are you sure? I’ve made a terrible mistake.
You’re so funny, Teddy.
I just think like, money’s not everything?
That’s preposterous!
There’s like, other things out there…
And only one thing that matters!
You could be a little nicer sometimes…
Nicer? Where does nice get anybody?
It doesn’t like, cost anything to be nice.
Hmph. It doesn’t pay anything either!
Is that like, an old person thing?
Old?! I’m in the prime of my life!
Oh! I didn’t mean to offend you!
Hmph.
Have you ever like, tried going vegan?
I eat mostly wheat, I reckon.
Oh, yeah?
Yeah, lotta pastry in me meat pies!
Another begining to a beautiful day!
I guess you could say that.
Feeling good this morning?
Nothing to complain about.
It's just such a pretty morning.
Oh, it is.
Today's going quick!
Not quick enough.
Lovely weather we're having.
Too right.
Another day coming to an end.
It gets dark quick!
The stars a pretty tonight.
Yeah, they are.
You think it's a full moon?
Just look up?
Wet enough for you?
You always say that.
This rain won't let up.
Why are you always wandering around in it?
This rain is great for my plants.
Happy to hear that.
Did you know, all the seeds I sell are from my own collection?
<shy>I started collecting the seeds when I was, like, just a little girl.
I would spend all the <Dinks> I had saved up and buy them wherever I could.
I didn’t have a lot of space on my family’s <AirShip>. So I could only grow certain plants at certain times.
I’ve always wanted some space to spread out, you know. Have a whole garden!
<haha>Even though I spent so much time in the air, I guess I, like, always wanted to be down here in the dirt and stuff.
That’s why I had to leave my family and stuff.
<sigh>Although, I miss them a lot, you know <PlayerName>.
<sigh>Hey <PlayerName>...
I’ve been kinda like, thinking about my family and stuff.
I didn’t leave them on the best of terms…
I guess you could say I kinda, like, ran away from them..
<boohoo>I didn’t even leave a note or anything. I just jumped out of the <AirShip> one night.
They didn’t understand that I wanted to stay in one place.
I just wanted to get to know some people, you know, make friends with someone and stuff.
<pumped> I do miss them, <PlayerName>.
But to be honest with you, coming to <IslandName> is, like, the most bonza thing that has ever happened to me.
I’ve gotten close to everyone here on the <IslandName>.
Especially you, <PlayerName>.
<haha>So, like, thanks for being my friend. My first friend!
<PlayerName>, I just wanted to thank you.
<no>Before I came to <IslandName> I’ve felt like I’ve never had a home.
<shy>I’ve never been able to, like, put down roots, so to say.
<yes>But thanks to you and everyone else here, <IslandName>, like, really feels like my home now.
<thinking>It snuck up on me so slowly that I guess I didn’t notice it and stuff.
<shy>So, yeah, like, thanks, <PlayerName>.
<glee>I’m so happy to be here on <IslandName>!
<no>They keep the birds away, but when I wave they never wave back.
<thinking>Although I can only sell them to people who have a <FarmingLicence>.
Oh... hey.
How can I help?
<shy>I, like, have a confession to make… I didn’t have a Farming Licence until recently…
